message.content: {"id": "20249", "title": "Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help", "description": "Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help ", "OB": "Currently, pressing F1 when the change editor menu is open displays some help. However, the help window closes immediately, making it difficult for the user to read the contents.", "EB": "If there is no F1 help defined for the change editor, viewer, and perspective menus, pressing F1 should not display anything to prevent flashing. Additionally, the actions under Window > Keyboard Shortcuts should have clear F1 help defined to describe their functionality.", "SR": "The help window for the change editor menu should stay open when F1 is pressed, allowing the user to read the help contents. If F1 help is intended for the change editor menu, it should be clearly displayed and readable."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '20249', 'title': 'Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help', 'description': 'Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'If there is no F1 help defined,then prssing F1 should not display anything so that there is no flashing.The same problem exists for the change viewer and change perspective menus.None of the actions under WindowKeyboard Shortcuts have any F1 help definedon them to describe what they do. ', 'SR': 'Build F2When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 will display some help.However, the help window closes immediately, before the contents can be read.If there is supposed to be F1 defined for the change editor menu, then the helpwindow should stay open for the user to read. '}
